description.value:
This rough metal staff is pitted and sandblasted, with thousands of nigh-imperceptible sand crystals embedded in its surface.

While carrying the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Occultism checks to identify aberrations and oozes native to the Darklands.

Activate Cast a Spell

  • Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Know Direction]

    1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Create Water] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Purify Food and Drink] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unseen Servant]

  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkvision] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Endure Elements]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Earthbind] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Neutralize Poison] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wanderer's Guide]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Air Walk] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hallucinatory Terrain] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rope Trick]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pillars of Sand] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Veil]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Purple Worm Sting] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Entity]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Blightburn Blast] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Control Sand] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unfettered Pack]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

rules.label: Staff of the Black Desert (identify oozes & aberrations of Darklands)

source.value: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands
